trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.VARFLAGS?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.VARFLAGS?displayProperty=fullName>相反。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `VARFLAGS`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关其他信息`VARFLAGS`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: The variable supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: 变量支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable is the single property that best represents the object.
trans-unit.target: 变量是最能代表对象的唯一属性。

trans-unit.source: Only one variable in type information can have this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 类型信息中的只有一个变量可以具有此属性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Permits an optimization in which the compiler looks for a member named "xyz" on the type of "abc".
trans-unit.target: 允许编译器寻找名为"xyz"上的"abc"的类型的成员的优化。

trans-unit.source: If such a member is found and is flagged as an accessor function for an element of the default collection, then a call is generated to that member function.
trans-unit.target: 如果此类成员找到，并且标记为默认集合的某个元素的访问器函数，然后对该成员函数生成的调用。

trans-unit.source: Permitted on members in dispinterfaces and interfaces; not permitted on modules.
trans-unit.target: 允许的调度接口和接口; 中的成员不允许在模块上。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable is displayed to the user as bindable.
trans-unit.target: 作为可绑定给该用户显示该变量。

trans-unit.source: VARFLAG_FBINDABLE must also be set.
trans-unit.target: 此外必须设置 VARFLAG_FBINDABLE。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable should not be displayed to the user in a browser, although it exists and is bindable.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它已存在并可绑定，则不应在浏览器中，向用户显示该变量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable is mapped as individual bindable properties.
trans-unit.target: 该变量作为单独的可绑定属性映射。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable appears in an object browser, but not in a properties browser.
trans-unit.target: 在对象浏览器，但不是在属性浏览器中，将显示变量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Assignment to the variable should not be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不应允许对变量赋值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Tags the interface as having default behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 标记为具有默认行为的接口。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: When set, any attempt to directly change the property results in a call to <xref uid="langword_csharp_IPropertyNotifySink::OnRequestEdit" name="IPropertyNotifySink::OnRequestEdit" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 任何设置时，尝试直接更改对的调用中的属性结果<xref uid="langword_csharp_IPropertyNotifySink::OnRequestEdit" name="IPropertyNotifySink::OnRequestEdit" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnRequestEdit" name="OnRequestEdit" href=""></xref> determines if the change is accepted.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref uid="langword_csharp_OnRequestEdit" name="OnRequestEdit" href=""></xref>确定是否接受更改。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable should not be accessible from macro languages.
trans-unit.target: 该变量不应可从宏语言中访问。

trans-unit.source: This flag is intended for system-level variables or variables that you do not want type browsers to display.
trans-unit.target: 此标志旨在用于系统级变量或不希望显示类型浏览器的变量。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable returns an object that is a source of events.
trans-unit.target: 该变量返回一个对象，它的源的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The variable is the default display in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 该变量是在用户界面的默认显示。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
